about.title: About Me
about.intro: Hi! I'm Arijit Mushib, a passionate Full Stack Developer based in Kolkata, West Bengal. I have a strong foundation in web development principles and practices, with a focus on building high-quality, scalable applications. My journey in technology began during my vocational education in Computer Science, where I developed a keen interest in Full Stack Development
about.internship: I recently completed an internship at Webguru Infosystem Pvt. Ltd., where I gained hands-on experience in developing web applications using modern technologies. This opportunity allowed me to work on exciting projects, collaborate with a talented team, and enhance my problem-solving skills.
about.learning: I'm always eager to learn new technologies and stay updated with industry trends. In addition to my technical skills, I believe in the importance of effective communication and teamwork in achieving successful outcomes.
about.highersecondary: Higher Secondary Education - Patharmora High School (H.S)
about.internship_role: Internship as a Full Stack Developer at Webguru Infosystem Pvt. Ltd.
about.projects: Projects: Developed multiple web applications using Full Stack and Cloud technologies.
